website_summaries.verdict: Similar to others we tested, but the Carrington Farms brand contains more product and is cold pressed.
pros: Has a mild, pleasant scent, and smooth consistency
cons: Several testers also had issues with the lid breaking

customer_reviews.title: Hoping for a miracle!
customer_reviews.text: This coconut oil is awesome! I use it for everything...frying eggs, in place of butter on toast, add it to coffee, etc. My mother has alzheimer's and her doctor suggested she take two tablespoons a day and he said in a couple of days we will see a big improvement. We have been easing her up to the two tablespoons, but even at the lower amount she seems to be thinking clearer with less confusion. Only time will tell, but we're very hopeful. Of course I ordered it from Amazon because of their quick delivery!!!
customer_reviews.author: eschercatTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff. Tastes great. Great hair, face and body moisturizer.
customer_reviews.text: I use this coconut oil for everything. I use it on my skin. On my hair and my daughter's hair. Dry skin. I love this stuff. So many uses. It's the only coconut oil I have found that works for everything. I also mix this with my therapeutic oils and add a little to the ends of my hair along with been and pumpkin oil. I also use this with cayenne pepper and vodka to make a hair root stimulator. This oil works for everything. Also great after showers to soften skin. So far this is my favorite brand. I won't use anything else at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for cooking. But, also you can make an old piece of wooden furniture look like new by rubbing this on. I had a table with scratches, & marks, & after rubbing this into the table they were gone! I had read about this in an article.
customer_reviews.author: Sonoma Lady

customer_reviews.title: Natures Way the Best Way!!!!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say but I looovveee this coconut oil. It has a taste to die for. I use it on my skin, hair and for cooking. Of course I always have to buy two at a time. People has asked me what do I do why my skin is so beautiful. "My answer coconut oil." When I cook with it my friends love the taste. I will never go back to using Olive Oil or any other oil. Moreover it's good for your cholesterol. If you love the taste of coconut try this oil. Nature's Way is the Best Way
customer_reviews.author: Nadjababy1

customer_reviews.title: Coconut oil is my best friend. I use it for everything
customer_reviews.text: Coconut oil is my best friend. I use it for everything. I like this for cooking and I use it on my skin as well. This kind is a little greasy so I wouldn't recommend on your face if you have somewhere to be. I use it on my child's diaper rashes and they clear up over night. I also use it on her nose for when she has a cold. It helps clear her boogies away without rubbing her nose raw. I have bought this brand several times and am really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Mold Spores Along the Bottom of Jar
customer_reviews.text: There was mold spores growing all along the bottom and I hadn't even opened it yet. First and last time buying from this brand and I paid too much money for the product to come in the way that it did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All in one
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil. I use it for my hair, skin oil pulling n cooking. Great for making pancakes n eggs..
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Hinton

customer_reviews.title: Best Body Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Creams are dangerous for our body. With skin being the largest organ, what we put on our skin, gets absorbed into our bodies. Grab your favorite body cream. Would you ingest the ingredients? Organic coconut oil is something that you eat and drink, bake with etc. What most people do not know is this is also amazing for a body moisturizer. Grab some of your favorite essential oils and add them in for a nice scent.
customer_reviews.author: JRBMMB

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Just Bad Luck.
customer_reviews.text: I previously bought the same brand and I was quite pleased. It had a that sweet and refreshing coconut smell. Leaves my skin that nice moisturized glow and makes my natural curly hair feel as soft as a bed of feathers. It lasted me around half a year to half a year. It is a great product from a great brand and it has served me well. The only reason I gave it a 3 star is because my recent coconut oil that I received today had brown spots at the bottom (good chance of mold.)
customer_reviews.author: Deshawn

customer_reviews.title: Trust me!!
customer_reviews.text: Works really well with intimacy .. Dr. recommended.. won't cause unwanted heath issues in women .. totally safe & way better & safer to use then other lubes or etc
customer_reviews.author: EMTAE

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff.....
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil....I usually buy this locally, but $13 was a good price. A friend of mine got me into this about 4 years ago and I keep my household stocked with it. No doubt there are more expensive and probably better versions of this, but this brand got me started and I refuse to change. This oil tastes soooooo good by itself or I cook with it and my favorite meal is fried eggs. Spray it in my pan and it gives the eggs a fantastic flavor. I also use this on my body, my hair, wherever. It truly is versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Cole

customer_reviews.title: Good product sometimes broken lids
customer_reviews.text: I've always loved this product but hate the lids. I had 2 good lids followed by 4 broken ones in a row. It happened so often that I would save the good lids knowing the new ones would come broken. They seemed to change the lids a year or so again but do not drop your coconut oil from any height starting at 1/100 of an inch or the lid will shatter into many, many pieces. So here I am again it's like deja vu except with the new lids not coming shattered i stopped saving the good ones. Who has a duct taped coconut oil lid? This guy!
customer_reviews.author: ilkmu3ex2

customer_reviews.title: I HATE coconut
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying I really HATE coconut ... in ALL forms. However due to the many health benefits, I keep trying different products in the hopes that I find one that is palatable. Nature's Way coconut oil far exceeded my expectations. It has what I found to be a mild coconut scent and nutty flavor. In fact, I found myself liking it so much that I would eat it straight off the spoon. Which would have been absolutely unheard of with other products. Thank you Nature's Way for a wonderful product ... keep an eye out for my next order!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Leaked Everywhere!
customer_reviews.text: The product is excellent in and of itself. When I received it, the oil leaked all in the box and over other items. I had a mess to clean up. Yet the almond butter was wrapped nicely in a sleeve-like bubble wrap. They should have put the coconut oil in a plastic bubble sleeve too! And the description above says "long lasting fragrance, 1-gallon all-purpose cleaner". Good going...it's bad when you get so big that you don't take care of your customer's anymore. I don't know how to resolve this other than to say I will be buying alot of my things elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Seraphimrose

customer_reviews.title: Ode to Coconut oil
customer_reviews.text: This bountiful oil is all I need, to make my awesome life, so complete. From dried scalp and skin, to frying my food. Is there nothing , this magical oil cant do? Gently removes make up from my face, Maybe its the extra virgin components, that give it such grace. And on April 15th, when my taxes are due.... Imma rub them in Coconut oil, and pray it fixes them too. Lovingly, rks
customer_reviews.author: Robyn S.

customer_reviews.title: Best coconut oil I've ever eaten.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing, I love it in my rice. I mix this with a little ginger in my rice and I get the most amazing rice ever. I have also put it in coffee and used to fry my eggs as well. Being with a Filipino Woman we eat a lot of rice. I like rice with stuff in it, but she can and loves just plain white rice. I made her some of the rice I like with coconut and ginger flavors, and she fell in love with it. Just something different for a change. I feel coconut oil is going to be found to help people with dementia and other health problems in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Rikster

customer_reviews.title: I like the taste and it keeps me away from bagels ...
customer_reviews.text: 3-5 days a week this joins some butter in my coffee for bullet coffee. I'm no dietician, all I know is on the days I have it I don't need anything else to eat for most of the day. I like the taste and it keeps me away from bagels and doughnuts. That's a win for me. I've also used it to fry eggs, cover a steak for grilling, and to make a salad dressing. It improves the taste of all of it and is supposed to be healthy. Another win.
customer_reviews.author: Ken P

customer_reviews.title: Twice now it has arrived with the lid cracked! ...
customer_reviews.text: Twice now it has arrived with the lid cracked! After the first time I chose to have it resent and it arrived cracked. I should have asked for a refund instead.
customer_reviews.author: KZ

customer_reviews.title: Unusable
customer_reviews.text: Was liquid oil when it arrived. Label clearly says “returns to solid when cooled” and this did NOT happen. It is unusable and just a bottle of liquified oil. Gross.
customer_reviews.author: Sonny

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.  5 Stars!
customer_reviews.text: Update: I was sent the liquid version. I see from other reviwes some people were sent the solid or liquid form. I don't believe you choose which version you want. BUT it WORKS THE SAME. the Solid will turn into the liquid form anyway so no big deal. *** This product is WONDERFUL. It smells really good. And it works really nicely on the skin*** It smells great! And it works! Thankyou.
customer_reviews.author: Little Lady

customer_reviews.title: Coconut Oil Heaven! Works wonders!
customer_reviews.text: Coconut oil is one of the best oils in the world for centuries. I have used many coconut oil productS before such is Vita coco and Nutiva and this by far is better. I use it for cooking my vegetables and for baking purposes. I also use this for massaging and to put that extra glow on my face. It has a light fresh smell and I use it every morning as a mouthwash and also oil pulling! For an organic coconut oil this size, it is a bargain! Will order again soon! It’s just perfect!
customer_reviews.author: C. Noorata

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great!
customer_reviews.text: This is very creamy-others can be really gritty- and love it in my tub. Yes, of course it a little slick but my feet look like someone else's now, no scaly, dried stuff on my heels anymore. This stuff seems to be recommended for a lot of things these days. I originally bought to make puppy treats for his dry, itchy skin-works like a charm on him too! At first I though, it's huge but I've gone through half of it already and thinking about giving it as gifts (kidding) but I will recommend especially for the smoothness.
customer_reviews.author: J. Moore

customer_reviews.title: , as you can see in the phone.
customer_reviews.text: The box was too big, there were no packing pillows, bubble wrap or paper. The jar rolled around and the lid cracked. When it’s hot outside, and the oil liquified, I was afraid it would run out of the jar. Not a great idea to mail something like this without some kind of box stuffing!!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara C.

customer_reviews.title: Changed my life
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love Nature’s Way Coconut oil. I suffer from seborrhecic dermatitis and had to use hydrocortisone cream for my flare ups, but not anymore, after using Nature’s Way on my face and scalp, it cleared my skin up wonderfully. I love to slather it on at night and wake up to hydrated healthy looking skin. This has become a part of my signature beauty routine. Moisturize! Moisturize! Moisturize!
customer_reviews.author: Kita

customer_reviews.title: This coconut oil has a nice coconut taste
customer_reviews.text: I eat a tablespoon of coconut oil when I take my Turmeric and Pepper mixed with water. This coconut oil has a nice coconut taste. Months stored at room temperature (mainly winter or colder temps so not hot outside) it stays solid and doesn't turn into liquid. A got a solid 3 months use out of it. Value wise a decent value but not the best value. By no means is this expensive coconut oil I would buy again and yes I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt A. Wetzel

customer_reviews.title: FRY FRY FRY
customer_reviews.text: Will order again and again. I use coconut oil to fry chicken strips and some other meats. It doesn't stick like butter and imparts a subtle sweetness (not overwhelming). I also use coconut oil (transfer some into a separate container) for my skin after a hot bath. Coconut oil is lighter than baby oil or other oils and absorbs quickly. It keeps on the shelf (although it doesn't last long in my household) and heats with little smoking unlike butter or olive oil. I love this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Ancient Activist, Aspiring Alchemist

customer_reviews.title: Natures Way coconut oil
customer_reviews.text: Has a subtle delicate flavor and is perfect to add a healthy fat to my coffee,food cooking at high temps ( fry eggs in). My HDL has risen, which is great!!! Wonderful hair and skin softening oil. I moisten my dry eyes with a sterile Q tip dipped in a dab at night so my eyes wont be dry and painful to open in the morning. Ive bought quite a few brands and this is the best for me.
customer_reviews.author: petunia

customer_reviews.title: Dry/Flaky Scalp
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product for over 4 months, applying to my scalp once a day, consecutively and I am dandruff free! I’m African American, following this with non-sulfate shampoo really helps for my type of hair. Any kind of 100% extra virgin coconut oil should help, however the price for this size jar to its price is unbeatable. Definitely satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They shipped it with a broken lid
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a broken lid. The broken piece wasn’t in the box which means they shipped a broken product. It will not be possible to keep the product properly closed and fresh. Not good!
customer_reviews.author: online shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great for Bullet Coffee
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this primarily to make my morning bullet coffee as I am not a breakfast guy. With just one tablespoon of this which is around 120 calories, I make my coffee which keeps me full until 1 PM. My 16 hour intermittent fasting is achieved as well since my insulin levels undisturbed with no morning carb load. Keeps my energy levels highand great flavors as well.
customer_reviews.author: Soumyajit

customer_reviews.title: Crazy price increase
customer_reviews.text: I really like this coconut oil. It tastes great and was a great value. What I do not like is the price increase. I purchased in June for $13.29 and August for $15.16. Today the price is $19.24!! That is a $6.00 price increase in 3 months. Ridiculous considering there are so many other options on the market. I am sure I will find another one that will work just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ann R.

customer_reviews.title: Best all around Coconut Oil on the market
customer_reviews.text: I love this Coconut Oil. I use it just about everywhere you can apply it. Great for after shower moisturizer, and it has no harmful chemicals in it like a lot of cosmetic moisturizers. I occasionally use it for cooking and baking, so it is very useful in so many ways. A great value also. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Fye

customer_reviews.title: Way to expensive
customer_reviews.text: Way to expensive. It’s just coconut oil. Nothing special , in fact , it’s in the dollar store $1 for a 4oz jar. Wish I returned it
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great Oil, Good Price
customer_reviews.text: I love the oil and use it to blend with others in my DIY personal care products. This is a good value from a company you can trust and I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: J Norville

customer_reviews.title: excellent moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this particular brand as it was organic. I typically use coconut oil in a mixture to create body butter. Now I just use this all on its own. I put it on my hair/scalp prior to bleaching and use it all over my body as a daily moisturizer. It is absorbed quickly and I have stopped buying other moisturizers. I have not cooked with it yet. My husband even uses it.
customer_reviews.author: AcJonz

customer_reviews.title: This coconut oil fixed my face. I suffered from ...
customer_reviews.text: This coconut oil fixed my face. I suffered from chronic sebhorreic dermatitis, and I heard coconut oil might help. I tried this stuff and OMG IT WORKED! Later on, I ran out and so I tried some of the Trader Joe's organic, virgin coconut oil. It didn't work, and I did some homework. It turns out that this oil has a lot of the Lauric Acid removed (which is why it'll stay liquid in the fridge). The remaining oils are Capric Acid and Caprylic Acid. These have antifungal/antibacterial properties that work amazingly for clearing up your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Nazzari

customer_reviews.title: Everything oil
customer_reviews.text: This is a for all oil. Very useful. I have a jar by my nightstand, in the kitchen and by my dog table. I have too many uses to name. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Jim

customer_reviews.title: Versitile and Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I like this coconut oil. I have been using it for 4 years now and have tried other brands in between, but have always return to this one. No artificial coconut smell, tastes great, and is versatile. I use it for hair, skin, teeth, cooking, and baking . It is unrefined so expect some grainyness. The only drawback is that the container/ lid some times arrive damaged. I have only ever encountered this problem when ordering through amazon. If you order directly through Swanson Vitamin's website, this will never be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: yanna

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This coconut oil is sold at a great price, and is of high quality. It is so good to have some coconut oil in your diet, as well as on hand for medical purposes. Our favorite recipe is freezer fudge: 1 cup coconut oil 1 cup nut butter of choice 1 cup cocoa powder 1/2 cup maple syrup 1 tsp vanilla Melt all ingredients gently in pot, then pour into a 9x9 pan lined with wax paper. Freeze. We use a knife to break off chunks. SO delicious and also healthy! I also use coconut oil on cuts, etc. Coconut oil has great antibacterial and antiviral properties.
customer_reviews.author: J and R

customer_reviews.title: This is absolutely delicious!!!! I put ...
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely delicious!!!! I put it in everything, including my gluten free oatmeal and yum!!! It makes it taste delicious without needing the extra coconut sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Aida

customer_reviews.title: So many uses for this high quality coconut oil!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, this is an absolute must have for everyone! We use the coconut oil for EVERYTHING! We always have at least two jars on hand. One for cooking (OMG popcorn made the old fashioned way but, with coconut oil, is to die for!) and another jar for the bathroom. We use it daily for moisturizing. I use it to tame my wild curly hair! It's a great hair conditioner. I work it into my dog's coat when I shampoo her as well. I have even used it to condition the wood of an old antique hutch I bought! I have turned so many people on to coconut oil and this Nature's Way brand is the best I have found.
customer_reviews.author: TAMMY L NORRBOM

customer_reviews.title: My favorite of all coconut oil
customer_reviews.text: My favorite of all coconut oil.. love the smell and tastes excellent! Can eat straight. Only not sure why it sometimes stays solid, and other jar get more liquidy.. This is my only complaint. I know it is not my room temp as we live in FL and our AC always on at same temp. I just had one that was solid, ordered a new one and it is turned to liquid unless i put in fridge.. this is disappointing as I like to use it in the harder state to eat and use on face, etc. I sent a letter to the company regarding this.
customer_reviews.author: pamela6000

customer_reviews.title: Skin magic
customer_reviews.text: Great for skin. Eczema and allergies are major in my home for my daughter and I. I use this coconut oil as and added level with palmers lotion for us both and it’s greatly soothing and assists with evening skin tone really fast. Delivery was immediate and the packaging was secure. Economically it definitely gives a bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: PaA

customer_reviews.title: bye keratosis pilaris!
customer_reviews.text: If you have keratosis pilaris try this!!! I have had it.. The goosebump rash that never went away, my whole life and using this coconut oil every day, and exfoliating the rash areas every other day in the shower completely got rid of it!! It took about 2 weeks of sticking to that regimen and for the first time I can remember the backs of my upper arms and thighs are smooth! :) you also can't beat the smell of coconut oil, I feel like a walking cookie lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, esp. for improving dogs' mental health
customer_reviews.text: I am using this because a research study showed that a tablespoon a day with dogs 8 years of age or older would have their cognitive functioning improved. But it is also good in cooking and also for dry skin. But I am interested in helping my animals.
customer_reviews.author: P. Loftis

customer_reviews.title: Coconut oil
customer_reviews.text: A great coconut oil for the hair I would definitely recommend this for family and friends
customer_reviews.author: Miki hues

customer_reviews.title: Smells delicious
customer_reviews.text: Okay I didn't actually get to use this for a long time because the lid was broken and it leaked out everywhere so it only had like a quarter of the jar left. I loved the way it smells and it absorbed very quickly. Its better then alot of others I've used. The company was more than happy to refund my money and I've been meaning to repurchase but keep forgetting lol. From what I did get to use it was a great product and didn't have that wierd plastic smell some others have.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly112997

customer_reviews.title: Broken lid
customer_reviews.text: The only thing about this, and it probably was the person who packed the box's fault, but the lid was broken when it arrived. The seal was still intact, so I am keeping it. I had to put into into other containers since there was no way to seal the jar. Other than that, it's a nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Benita Story

customer_reviews.title: Many more uses than I dreamed
customer_reviews.text: Originally bought for a healthier choice for the granola I make, then tried replacing butter in quick bread recipes added great texture and flavor. It is now my go to product for most oil replacements (not much cooking, low temp burn point). Here`s the wierd part, I bought it for cooking, now my mrs. uses it after shower for skin softening and I even tried it on my beard and it beat heck out of anything else for softening that scratchy little devil. This is a quality first press product, pure enough for cooking or any other use you can find. Good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Came completely busted
customer_reviews.text: This arrived completely busted. It was packaged loosely in a box where it had plenty of room to move around and clearly break. This broke the seal that covers the oil so the plastic pieces that broke off from the lid are dispersed in the oil. I won't be able to cook with this now.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Careful
customer_reviews.text: Be careful! I found a piece of a metal screw in mine! Shocked me!
customer_reviews.author: Aingeal

customer_reviews.title: I use it for healthy pop corn on the stove
customer_reviews.text: I took more with coconut oil now then a do with olive oil. I love that its easy to use on a high-temperature. I use it for healthy cooking to pop popcorn over the stove. I just put a little coconut oil in a pot with a lid plus a few kernels until they pop over medium heat. Then I add in 1/3 cup of kernels until they pop up light and fluffy. Then just add more melted coconut oil + salt or drizzle hot sauce. YUM.
customer_reviews.author: Jen K

customer_reviews.title: I like the brand.
customer_reviews.text: I just like the product. You don't have to refrigerate it. I use it on my cereal in the morning. Have used it for my memory for a few years. My mom had altimers & had found out the coconut oil might help the memory.
customer_reviews.author: Peg

customer_reviews.title: Coconut oil
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this coconut oil for his skin, he eats it with veggies and puts it on his dogs as skin and coat. He uses it so often that we are on a subscription service with amazon. It’s an amazing product .
customer_reviews.author: enery

customer_reviews.title: Great Use for Making Protein Shakes
customer_reviews.text: I primarily this for my protein shake, so I really can’t comment too much on the taste or the moisturizing aspect of it. It has a delicate coconut taste but that’s about it. Haven’t tried using it on my skin but, if I do, I will update my feedback on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect coconut oil. Bad delivery.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t use this for eating. Amazon threw this in a box and delivered it. The product itself is perfect. I use it as a lotion and I use it as conditioner for my hair. The product itself is perfect! I found this brand because I got a tattoo several years ago and the artist told me to put it on my new tattoo. When this arrived it had a broken lid and was leaking! I heated it a little more than it already was and poured it into a different container. Ugh! Don’t throw stuff around. It’s the best coconut oil on the market!
customer_reviews.author: Les

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Coconut Oil
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many coconut oils and none compares to this one. This is my favorite coconut oil I've been using for years! I use it for EVERYTHING! Many benefits when using coconut oil. I've replaced my shaving cream, lotions, hair masks, and sunscreen (if I'm not out in the sun for to long). I make homemade toothpaste, oil pull with it, and also cook with it. It really enhances flavors when cooking. Honestly it is just the best and has such a good flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Kimieboo

customer_reviews.title: Be careful of the size.
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised with this larger sized jar came in the mail. The price is good in comparison to the smaller sized jar from Walgreens. It will take me forever togo through this jar and I used it to remove makeup and I only wear makeup occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: Toni E.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product exceeded expectation. My only complaint would be that there is miniscule particles of she'll in the product. So as I'm applying to my skin I feel grit. This can be a problem if the area is sensitive such as a fresh tattoo.
customer_reviews.author: Nunya

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor, good price.
customer_reviews.text: This coconut oil is so delicious I could eat it with a spoon straight out of the jar. It's the fragrant type, so you do get a noticeable-but-mild sweetness and aromatic smell, which is a far cry better than some of the bland coconut oils I can find at my local Safeway. The price is also much better than my local Safeway, where a 16oz jar is roughly $10. (Thanks, San Francisco.)
customer_reviews.author: Replicant

customer_reviews.title: I'm Addicted!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this coconut oil. I've never used it for any cooking purposes, I keep this big ol' bulk tub under the sink in the bathroom and use it in my beauty and skin health routine. It's the perfect makeup remover - I put a tiny glob on each eye (lots of black mascara and eyeliner) and rub it clean with a washcloth. I have sensitive skin and hate makeup removers with all the nasty chemicals which dry out my skin. With this, it removes my eye and face makeup gently while mousturizing the sensitive skin. Also works great as a body / face lotion, personal lubricant for adult needs, chapstick, and hair conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: L. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Product Longevity, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Nature's Way Coconut Oil is a great way to attain versatility in the kitchen. Furthermore, coconut oil goes beyond cooking and you can use it for other things such as skin application, hair moisturizing and more, depending on what you're into. The 32-Ounce jar goes a long way and preserves nicely in a cool dark cabinet. Solidification is easily dispersed by heating up the oil - simply submerge the jar partially in a pot of water on the stove under mild heat until the product liquifies, apply/utilize as necessary. There are many healthy benefits to using coconut oil, brief research will yield many results, if you're interested. I have no complaints about this product.
customer_reviews.author: James, Chase

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs this healthy coconut oil everyday!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this coconut oil! Extremely healthy! All kinds of uses! I use it in my coffee in the morning. I use it to cook with. I also use it in my hot tea in the evening as well as in my hair for intense conditioning and on my skin fir intense moisture!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It flavors everything, not a plus
customer_reviews.text: While I understand this is coconut I did not expect it to overpower everything I put it in. I gave it to my daughter in law who loves it, but I don't recommend for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Datsmar

customer_reviews.title: I <3 Coco Oil
customer_reviews.text: Great amount, great price. I have never had an issue with this brand, all oil is fresh and pure. I love to use it in body products and eat it. It is good in EVERYTHING. I love how you can cook anything in coconut oil. For frying Peanut and Grape Seed are better but for high heat and for meat coco is great. Also it has recently been shown that Coconut Oil is WAY healthier than vegetable oil which is TOXIC. Coconut oil is also delicious, vegetables cooked in coconut oil and salt take on a very subtle, nutty, excellent flavor. I will bet re-ordering soon!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Coconut Oil
customer_reviews.text: This has long been my favorite coconut oil. It arrived FAST and is as expected, delicious. I found it here for much less than my usual store and will purchase from Amazon from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Bear

customer_reviews.title: Coconut oil at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I love Nature's Way coconut oil. My first jar of this oil was purchased at a local pharmacy. I love that I was able to find a larger jar on amazon as I use it for many things. Mainly for its moisturizing benefits and diluting essential oils before applying them to sensitive skin. I have cooked with it and utilized it when "pulling". I would recommend this brand as it is offered at a great price and I have had no problems with it. I know it will last me for quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: Muggle Born

customer_reviews.title: The best thing ever for my skin
customer_reviews.text: 1. I have severe skin dryness, eczema and sensitivity. No lotion, oil, body butter or product was right, until I started using this specific coconut oil. It's pure-form coconut oil, it's smooth, it's perfect. 2. My boyfriend loves everything coconut, and he was absolutely shocked by how strong the coconut scent is, in a good way. He compared it to the rainbow coconut candy bar scent, which he said is "Incredible". 3. It's great for cooking, it's super healthy, and is organic. All in all, it's really an amazing, amazing product to have. Super recommended. I keep buying it again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Em G

customer_reviews.title: REALLY A NICE CHANGE
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I have purchased coconut oil and I was truly surprised how great it is. Your food seems to have a little extra flavor. I use it for a lot of frying, but most of all for popcorn. It give the popcorn just that like extra in taste. I have not eaten it plain as some people do or use it as a skin moisturizer. For now I like the taste it gives my veggies and desserts that require any oil. I never thought it would make such a difference. This is the only brand I have tried and since I really like it , I see no reason to switch.
customer_reviews.author: CINNA

customer_reviews.title: Really strong 'buttery' type smell?
customer_reviews.text: Not sure I would buy again, this has a really really "buttery" smell to it...I've bought Spectrum Coconut oils in the past and they didn't smell as strong as this one does. If you're putting in food and cooking, it probably doesn't matter, but if you're going to use for any sort of skin care or hair care product I would probably avoid because of the smell. Other than that, it really is a good price. I would get it again if I mainly were using it for cooking and my protein shakes.
customer_reviews.author: The Bades

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I have tried a couple of other Coconut Oils and this one seems to absorb into my skin quicker and feels less greasy. I use it to make my own body butter also. The wide opening in the jar is perfect for getting every little bit of oil out. When I cook or bake, the flavor cooks into food nicely and is a great way to enhance my "clean" eating program. I use coconut oil for many purposes and Nature's Way Extra Virgin Organic Coconut Oil is my coconut oil of choice.
customer_reviews.author: monica0124

customer_reviews.title: Great but . .
customer_reviews.text: Took away 1 star because this is how I received it in the box happy the product was sealed if not it would have been a mess should definitely be packaged better but overall still happy with my order and will be ordering again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jaylin

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging but great product.
customer_reviews.text: Container leaked in box. But not horribly. Luckily everything else that was in the box didn't get damaged. Product itself is great. As described. No complaints on product itself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Mild Flavor - Great in Salads!
customer_reviews.text: I use a lot of coconut oil in my diet, as I am a diabetic and want to include only good fats in my diet. I love Natures Way Extra Virgin Organic Coconut Oil. It has a nice mile flavor which is very good in salads. I actually use it in place of any other salad dressing. I also love the fact that I can buy this on the subscribe-and-save plan at Amazon. This reduces the price even more - making it a truly great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Croft

customer_reviews.title: Remarkable and Amazing Product. Can't do without it now. Wonderful Product
customer_reviews.text: It seems like Coconut Oil is all the health rage. This is Organic Extra Virgin 100% Pure Coconut Oil. I use it for just about everything: beauty, medicines, cooking, diet supplements, 3 tbsp a day and my dog really loves it too and it's good for her too. I'm a true believer and shopper of AMAZON and I'm on my 5th order of this remarkable Coconut Oil
customer_reviews.author: Vicky M.

customer_reviews.title: Versitile product
customer_reviews.text: I love Nature's Way Organic Extra Virgin Coconut Oil because it's affordable and the high level of versatility makes this oil a great option which can be easily incorporated into dozens of natural homemade skin care recipes and natural non toxic cleaning product alternatives.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Choi

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this oil!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this oil! It's really healthy for you and tastes good too on salads. I mix half and half of oil and rice vinegar on my salads. For cooking it's even better. It doesn't splatter like other oils and if it seeps into the food it's good for you. I will never again use corn oil. Update: I went cheap and bought another brand. What a mistake. It never got solid and splattered all over. Just ordered another one of these and threw the other one out.
customer_reviews.author: Billieg

customer_reviews.title: Get rid of the lard in your life!
customer_reviews.text: Change you cooking to a healthier life style. Get rid of the lard in your kitchen get rid of the lard on your thighs. Don't be freaked out by the size of this product. It dosent take much. We are used to so much lard soaked food that you won't need it with coconut oil. I used it even for sunny side up eggs and they tasted so much fresher. Cooked in less time and didn't have the burned edges as the heat doesn't have to be so high. My health food store has this same brand and the price was comparable. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS STUFF
customer_reviews.text: It smells like real coconut,tastes like real coconut. I use it as a hot oil treatment for my locs( dreads) and they love it. They are shiny and soft something they have NEVER been before. Although I apply my oil after I shampoo my hair. I divide my damp hair into four section and apply the oil from root to tip, giving the ends a little extra coconut oil, cover and sit under the hairdryer for 20 mins and the result fabulous mositurised locs. My sin sure loves it, shiny and smooth, without the oily feel. As for perfume, coconut is mine. just yummmmmmmm. This size is a steal for the price, and the quality is the same.
customer_reviews.author: A Shopper Lost

customer_reviews.title: Great beauty product
customer_reviews.text: I discovered coconut oil as a beauty product about six months ago and now use it for everything. It works great as a moisturizer (especially for the face), make up remover, and hair treatment. I even found that it helps reduce razor-burn if you put it on after shaving. I've been trying to use only natural/organic beauty products as name brand's have tons of added synthetic chemicals, preservatives, and other harsh ingredients. I don't have to worry about any of that with this product. After using this coconut oil, my skin feels much cleaner, and looks better than ever. I recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Erin L.

customer_reviews.title: A Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for the skin that can be taken internally or even cooked with. It's good for you when applied in any of these ways. The price is low for 32 oz. of an organic product and bears the USDA stamp testifying that it is all natural. Keep it at room temperature of below, otherwise, like most oils, it liquifies, making it easy to spill if you open it in a hurry. This oil is great for the skin when used as a moisturizer, and it is great for keeping the heels of one's feet soft. Great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Stanley  C. Sargent

customer_reviews.title: CAN BE USED FROM HEAD TO TOE .
customer_reviews.text: I viewed my daughter in law using the coconut oil on my grand-daughters hair and the hair is growing so long and healthy.So I decided to try it my self and while I started on my hair I began to rub on my entire body after a shower and how soft and subtle my skin has become . I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Janet T

customer_reviews.title: Is this really pure coconut oil???
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for oil pulling for a while and am throwing out the rest and getting the other brand. It's very grainy, as is there's 2 different types of oil mixed together: One that's smooth and one that is more solid and grainy (that's the only way I can describe it.) It takes a few minutes for the grainy part to dissolve in your mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth B

customer_reviews.title: Great for body products and has many uses.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite coconut oils and I use it for a lot of things. I love that it a great product that can be delivered exactly when I need it.
customer_reviews.author: CBish

customer_reviews.title: Helps my dog's dry skin.
customer_reviews.text: I put dry dog food in his bowl, put a couple of tablespoons of this on top, pop ot in the microwave for a minute and not only is it tastier but it seems to help with my dog's dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Jim E.

customer_reviews.title: I got this product for....
customer_reviews.text: my hair and it has worked wonders. Pure coconut oil really does help with hair breakage. I had extreme damage to my hair due to dying and frying my hair, but the coconut oil has really done a great job repairing all of the damage I have done. I also have discovered cooking with this coconut oil. There are so many health benefits with this product and since I have started cooking with this oil, I have noticed that my meals taste so good and it feels good knowing that I'm using a health conscious product. I definitely recommend this product. The large quantity makes it easy to be able to use for multiple purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary from Beverly Hills

customer_reviews.title: This is the best brand of Coconut Oil
customer_reviews.text: This is the best brand of Coconut Oil! I've been using it for the last 2yrs. It has a premium quality, wonderful, smooth in texture and scent, and doesn't have an overpowering coconut smell, but very pure and clean fragrance. It's great and multi-purpose in everything - skin care for moisturizing, sun protection, and to heal sun burns, use it on baby's bumbum at diaper changes, as a natural deodorant and toothpaste / oil pulling, overall body health, and it's oh so yummy in protein shakes, smoothies, cereal, baking, homemade chocolate with pure cacao powder, etc! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Aya

customer_reviews.title: What a great, helpful product!
customer_reviews.text: What a great product! I love using this in my hair as a deep conditioner (once or twice a month), before shampooing/conditioning. I also use this on my dog. He's got very dry, sensitive skin. I cover him in coconut oil and let it sit on him for a few minutes before giving him his normal bath. It really helps soothe his skin and alleviate his dry, itchy skin issues. It's very easy to apply (to both myself and my pup!). I just scoop some in my palm, and it warms up into a liquid quickly.
customer_reviews.author: VRex

customer_reviews.title: great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is GREAT!!! Altzheimers is in both my husband's family, and mine. We are praying we don't have to suffer this. When reading a book on the disease, it was recommended to use this in your diet to avoid the big A. I ordered it immediately, and never run out. I use it to cook, add it to oatmeal, and any time I think of it. Is it working? I do not know, but I know we love the flavor. When cooking our veggies, I add a couple of tablespoons, potatoes/asparagus/peppers/onions and cook slowly while my meat is cooking. What a tasteful dish. I've served it to family, even our 16 year old granddaughter who hates veggies loved them.
customer_reviews.author: grannySue

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for so many uses.
customer_reviews.text: This does EVERYTHING. I use as a cleanser and moisturizer for my skin that breaks out and it has cleared up. Used as a hair mask for dry hair, my hair has NEVER felt so soft or looked so good. Great body moisturizer. Removes the little bumps on the back of your arms and scales on your legs from the winter. Great for feet/pedicures. I hate anything that leaves a residue on my skin. When your skin comes in contact, it melts and absorbs within seconds. I took the whole jar and put it in my Kitchen Aid and mixed for 6 minutes. A pasty, fluffy mix that is so much easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product before and will continue to use it. I appreciate the extra virgin flavor so the coconut doesn't over power my dishes and baked goods but I do love coconut so I really wouldn't care that much. This product has a low melting point and doesn't burn easily like some oils. In the summer you might want to store in the frig if you like the solid nature of this oil otherwise it will stay a liquid.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy Cat Lady

customer_reviews.title: My Brand!
customer_reviews.text: The only brand I purchase. It is consistent and I trust natures way... Great price on Amazon, compared to the local health food store. I have been purchasing for years and I have never been disappointed. The smell is great. I use it on my body, hair and cooking. I am never without a jar. You wont be disappointed, in my humble opinion.
customer_reviews.author: RKW

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite oil so far
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite oil so far. Smells so good. Love that it's extra virgin organic. We are trying to get away from using so many chemicals in our every day personal hygiene and beauty products. This oil has helped us come a long way in a short time. It's safe enough to eat, but also great for beauty products. My hair has never been so soft and shiny. A little bit also goes a long way, so I believe this jar will last us quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Love, love it!
customer_reviews.text: My dog has had flaky skin this summer so did some research on natural remedies. Came across something on Coconut oil and all its awesome uses. Found this at a pretty good price so figured Id try it out. Absolutley love it! Shes shinier than ever and seems to be digesting food a bit better also. I have also replaced cokking with other oils and butter with it. It taste delicious! Great product, great price, and efficient delivery.
customer_reviews.author: kristi smith

customer_reviews.title: Multi purpose coconut oil
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand of coconut oil. But I am really tired of this item being shipped with a broken lid. I have purchased 3 in the last year and a half. All 3 have had broken lids. Coconut oil is an amazing moisturizer for the entire body. The added benefits being there are no added colors, fillers or preservatives or scents. I personally love the fact that this oil does not stain or ruin fabrics.
customer_reviews.author: That Other Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I use this stuff for EVERYTHING. On my skin and in my hair as well. It's wonderful. My daughter has eczema and this stuff was something I "tried" on her skin and she didn't have a bad reaction with. And it helped with her to reduce scarring as the skin started to heal. It helps to moisture the hair was is very dry, even my husband uses it on his legs/heals and feet. IF you rub it in well, your skin isn't greasy after use either. As long as you don't use to much.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great to cook with!!!
customer_reviews.text: Coconut oil is healthy and great to cook with! This product is fabulous at a Great price and convenient shipping from Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: mimscase

customer_reviews.title: Coco for Coconut Oil
customer_reviews.text: Nice for so many uses. I've used it for my hair and face since it is extra virgin and organic. I purchased it for use in smoothies, and it works great for that purpose. Gives a nice boost of energy and you really don't know it's in the flavored smoothies. I've heard so many uses for this product so I'll have to keep experimenting. It came as a liquid because of the heat, but it's now in a firm, smooth consistency.
customer_reviews.author: Patty H.

customer_reviews.title: OIL PULL
customer_reviews.text: Bought this oil to do an oil pull every morning - it helps remove the toxins and the coconut Oil is the most pleasant to use - nice size jar and it is not liquid form but I just either put in microwave for a few seconds or leave out on counter if it is warm and it readily turns to liquid! pleasant tasting and the other great side effect of doing a pull is that even my teeth are whiter - if you are curious just Google "oil pulling". Helps your gums, bad breath and is good for you in so many ways. Heard about it years ago, but has recently resurfaced and has everyone buzzing about it!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Ann Sterling

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but smokes at medium high temperature.
customer_reviews.text: I like this very much, flavor, consistency and price. I only gave it 4 stars because I was really surprised at how much it smokes on a medium high temperature when cooking. I should be able to use coconut oil to cook at a higher temperature than olive oil, yet my olive oil smokes less. It makes me question why?
customer_reviews.author: D. Francis

product_meta.title: Nature's Way Organic Extra Virgin Coconut Oil, Pure & Unrefined, Cold-Pressed, USDA Organic, Non-GMO, 32 Ounce
product_meta.description: Pure, Cold Pressed, Organic, Non-GMO Coconut Oil. Premium Source: Organic, extra virgin, unrefined & unbleached from non-GMO coconuts. Hexane-free. 62% MCTs: 8.7g medium chain triglycerides (lauric, caprylic and capric acids) per serving. Delicious Uses: Enjoy straight from the jar or use in spreads, dips & more! Enhances the flavor of your favorite foods. For cooking, baking or sautÉing up to 350°. See Supplement Facts for total fat and saturated fat content.
feature_bullets: EXTRA VIRGIN COCONUT OIL. Pure, cold-pressed, extra virgin coconut oil. USDA Certified Organic, unrefined, unbleached, hexane-free, and gluten-free. Superior taste and aroma. The product is vegetarian and it has no added sugars
WITH 62% MCTS (MEDIUM CHAIN TRIGLYCERIDES). See Supplement Facts for total fat and saturated fat content
VARIETY OF USES. Extra Virgin Coconut Oil is great for cooking with a superior taste and aroma. Add to coffee, shakes, or smoothies.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
